Publication Title: Immune mechanisms shape the clonal landscape during early progression of prostate cancer
Publication Keywords: prostate cancer, Immunoediting, Clonal Competition, Single-cell Transcriptomics
Publication Authors: Lara F Tshering, Fu Luo, Savanah Russ, Mariola Szenk, Diana Rubel, Karis Tutuska, James G Rail, Gábor Balázsi, Michael M Shen, Flaminia Talos
Publication Abstract: Understanding the role of the immune microenvironment in modulating intratumor heterogeneity is essential for effective cancer therapies.
